data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 4,156,700 people living in Compostela Valley.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Compostela Valley, Philippines

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 579,020 believers in Compostela Valley.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Compostela Valley.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 579,020 believers in Compostela Valley against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kalagan people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Compostela Valley who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, convict the 579,020 believers in Compostela Valley to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Compostela Valley who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
